geoCommand.object: UPDATE WEB50.M_W_MIR_GORODA SET WKB_GEOMETRY=:WKB, "XMIN"=:XMIN, "XMAX"=:XMAX, "YMIN"=:YMIN, "YMAX"=:YMAX, STYLE= CASE WHEN :TOPOLOGY = 2 THEN '<MI_STYLE>Line (1,2,0) </MI_STYLE>' WHEN :TOPOLOGY = 3 THEN '<MI_STYLE>Pen (1,2,0) Brush (2,16777215,16777215)</MI_STYLE>' ELSE '<MI_STYLE>Symbol (32,0,12)</MI_STYLE>' END WHERE ID = :ID

UPDATE WEB50.M_W_MIR_GORODA SET WKB_GEOMETRY=:WKB, "XMIN"=:XMIN, "XMAX"=:XMAX, "YMIN"=:YMIN, "YMAX"=:YMAX, STYLE= CASE WHEN :TOPOLOGY = 2 THEN '<MI_STYLE>Line (1,2,0) </MI_STYLE>' WHEN :TOPOLOGY = 3 THEN '<MI_STYLE>Pen (1,2,0) Brush (2,16777215,16777215)</MI_STYLE>' ELSE '<MI_STYLE>Symbol (32,0,12)</MI_STYLE>' END WHERE ID = :ID

dbCommand.query: UPDATE WEB50.M_W_MIR_GORODA SET WKB_GEOMETRY=NULL, "XMIN"=NULL, "XMAX"=NULL, "YMIN"=NULL, "YMAX"=NULL, STYLE=NULL WHERE ID = :ID

geoQuery.query: SELECT d.ID, d.страна "LABEL", d."XMIN", d."XMAX", d."YMIN", d."YMAX", d.WKB_GEOMETRY, d.STYLE FROM WEB50.M_W_MIR_STRANY d WHERE {FILTER} ORDER BY ID
